title: [Sunken Mausoleam, Hallway]
[Sunken Mausoleum, Hallway]
description: Stagnant water pools at the back of the mausoleum on the opposite side of where the archway leads back to the entry.  The walls are a green tinge with patches of moss growing up the granite.  The slope in the floor comes to an end just before a short flight of steps leading further inside.
